grid

There are hundreds of existing grid systems out there, and honestly there is no need to make another one just for roots. So I brought in the most excellent and flexible semantic.gs, which is truly fantastic. Feel free to check out the documentation on the semantic.gs site - but it's very easy to use. To set initial styles, call grid() at root level. There are a few configuration variables for the grid in the settings file. What follows is an example of a fluid grid with a main area and sidebar.

  grid()

  column-width: 60
  gutter-width: 20
  columns: 12
  total-width: 100%

  .main
  .sidebar
    float: left

  .main
    column(9)

  .sidebar
    column(3)
